enb_long_title: Ninth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Delegates heard a presentation by CGE Chair Brian Challenger (Antigua and Barbuda) on the proposed work programme of the CGE for 2003-7.
Participants discussed the distribution of regional experts within each of the thematic groups of the CGE, and funding for workshops.
The US, supported by the EU, suggested that workshops be organized based on status of preparation of communications, rather than on regions.
Draft conclusions were distributed for discussion at the next contact group meeting.
